snippet.title: Crossing The Sands - May 2024 Gameplay Demo
snippet.description:
Gameplay demo of Crossing The Sands, a first-person dungeon crawler with turn-based combat currently available on Steam at https://store.steampowered.com/app/2505100/Crossing_The_Sands/

In this video, the party explores the desert and fights some lesser beasts, and then arrives in the Grand City to do some business. After this, the party continues on to the Forgotten City and then the City of Assassins, heedless of the danger that awaits them in the streets.

Recorded in May 2024, just after a major user interface update to this DRPG.

Soundtrack by Bloodless Mushroom.
